features: 【Mini Portable】You can put portable fan in your pocket or bag, also can wear this fan on a lanyard around your neck.Go to work, travel easy to carry. Don't worry about sweat damaging your makeup
【Adjustable Speed】This small fan has 3-level wind setting to adjust the wind speed.Giving you a comfortable cooling experience in hot days

【Multifunction】Handheld, Hanging Neck and Table fan. You can hold it at hand, hang it on your neck with a lanyard (included),frees your hand when you need to hold a phone and other stuff. Besides, you can also fold it and put on the table as a desk fan, with a rotation of 180 degree

【High Capacity Power】 The fan is equipped with 3000mAh battery, can last for 3-14 hours as fan function. And only takes about 2 hours to be full charged. If you need, the usb fan can serve as a 3000mAh high capacity powerbank
【Fashion Design 】High quality material brings the small fan good touch, mini size and light weight makes it perfect for outdoor and travel.Great gifts for family and friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my little cool cool cool fan
reviews.reviewText: I have used this GREAT Allxin Portable Handheld Personal Necklace Fan Foldable Mini Quiet USB Rechargeable Fan everywhere - in my office, at home on conference calls, on a flight from NY to CA and yes...even standing in line in a store. It is so great and pretty quiet on the lowest setting. My next plan is to try it on the high setting while walking along the beach. Big plusses are it's a perfect size (not too small or big), charge lasts a long time - I have had it on for hours and battery still wasn't empty, various tilt angles, doesn't get hot when using it, fits in my purse and it can act as a desktop phone holder so I can watch a video hands-free. Some reviews mention that it uses the older USB charging connector but I don't mind that. My portable battery has multiple charging connector tips. And most folks have an old school charging cord in a drawer somewhere. Can pick one up for a few bucks nowadays if needed. Happy using!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better then I thought
reviews.reviewText: So I am using this dope little fan/power bank while I am working offshore I hang it in my bunk and keeps circulation going for quite a while. I recharge it while I’m out working and use it while I sleep. And the air it pushes for it being so small is actually amazing especially on the lowest setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light and portable
reviews.reviewText: 3 fan settings, not super powerful but more than enough to keep you cool on a hot day without being overly noisy. Light, foldable, fits easily in a purse/backpack/fanny pack. A little fragile because it’s plastic, but with minimal care it will last. My son has dropped it a fee times and it still works great. Charging is easy and the battery lasts for a good while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for plane
reviews.reviewText: I love the size and the it’s fairly good speed as well.It was great on plane to hold my phone and watch movie plus have air flow ( motion sickness so air flow is a must for me)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I keep it in my purse
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to take to a music festival to cool off and to have an extra emergency charger. I keep it in my purse now bc I have temperature regulation issues. Works great. 3 fan settings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED: Fan is beginning to die
reviews.reviewText: Bought this fan about 8 months ago, and in the beginning, this was a great buy. A fan with three speeds, a phone holder (landscape), and a power bank. For example, when I worked in a warehouse back when I purchased this, this item was crucial for me to have a good lunch break. I would prop my phone on the indented slot on the fan, plug it in and charge my phone, and have the fan running on a medium speed. My lunch breaks were drastically changed after buying this, since I can charge my phone, watch netflix, and get cooled down all without having to touch my phone. At the time, this was a 5 star item without a doubt.Fast forward 8 months, and unfortunately the fan seems to be nearing the end of its life. The battery life on the fan is very weak (used to be able to last multiple days, without having to charge it, with an hour or 2 of use a day). Now, the fan will last about 20 minutes on high, 30 minutes on medium, and 45 minutes on low, and that's without anything plugged into the power bank side of it. Solely the fan consuming the battery. Also, the fan blades themselves or most likely the motor now makes a weird noise. It either sounds like the blades are hitting something, or the motor is dying. I believe it is the motor, because the blades sound fine during the boot up sequence.TLDR: At first, this fan is a really great buy, and I would give it a 5/5. But the issues come as time goes on, the fan motor, and battery life quickly depreciates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mini fan to cool down phone or small tech
reviews.reviewText: The first item I received did not work, so I returned it. If you do need to return it then keep the box so it can be returned easily. I ordered a replacement because I wanted this to work. The replacement came in and it works! The cute fan is what I need when I want to cool down my phone has it’s charging or when I want to cool down a little bit. It’s a small quiet fan, that works for me.My only worry is the charging port. My last one broke because the charging port got pushed in too far back. My old one lasted me about 2 yrs or more, so I hope this one is the same as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves it. It is as advertised.My husband sweats a lot so it comes in very handy and useful.
Es práctico, y le dura muy bien la batería, muy buena compra!

reviews.reviewTitle: Es pequeño pero perfecto para ventilador personal.

reviews.reviewText: Es igual a como en la foto del producto, tiene 3 velocidades generalmente yo creo que solo se utilizaría la tercera velocidad que es la más fuerte ya que con las otras 2 sentí muy poco aire sin embargo funciona muy bien.
